name: The Index
startIntroPart1: The Prescripts will lead the way...
declaringWar: We will do as the Prescripts say, even if it includes your destruction.
attacked: We have faith that the Prescripts have accounted for this...
defeated: This was to be our fate as the Prescripts have already decided...
introduction: Our ties will be decided by the Prescripts...
hateHello: We will have you know, the Prescripts has already planned your demise...
afterPeace: The Prescripts have planned something grand for us...
tradeRequest: The Prescripts have made a request...
